TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs`1<T> extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs
Public Class RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs(Of T) Inherits RoutedEventArgs
generic <typename T> public ref class RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs : System::Windows::RoutedEventArgs

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 发生更改的依赖属性的类型。

span.span: The type of the dependency property that has changed.

summary.span: 提供有关依赖属性值更改的数据（由特定的路由事件报告），其中包含发生更改的属性的旧值和新值。

span.span: Provides data about a change in value to a dependency property as reported by particular routed events, including the previous and current value of the property that changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个泛型类，类用于不同事件的事件数据。This is a generic class where the class is used for event data of different events. 不同的路由的事件可以指定以生成特定于类型的事件数据类的泛型类型约束。Different routed events can specify the type constraint of the generic to produce a type-specific event data class. 约束类，一旦和属性也反映了这些类型约束; 因此您可以使用常见的事件数据类的不同属性更改事件而无需对每个可能的不同的委托属性类型。Once the class is constrained, the and properties also reflect these type constraints; thus you can use a common event data class for different property changed events without requiring different delegates for each possible property type. 在委托中合并此事件数据类的属性更改进行报告的路由的事件包括，其中类型约束 （和参数中传递的旧的和新值） 的类型是，和，其中类型约束是。Routed events that reports a property change where the delegate incorporates this event data class include , where the type constraint (and old and new values passed in the arguments) is of type , and , where the type constraint is .

param.name: newValue
param.span: 属性在引发事件时的新值。

span.span: Current value of the property at the time of the event.

summary.span: 使用提供的旧值和新值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with provided old and new values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 传递的类型必须匹配的已声明的特定的泛型约束。The types passed must match the declared constraints of the specific generic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为传递的类型`oldValue`和`newValue`必须匹配的已声明的特定的泛型约束。The types passed for `oldValue` and `newValue` must match the declared constraints of the specific generic.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InvokeEventHandler (Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InvokeEventHandler(class System.Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget) cil managed

protected: override void InvokeEventHandler(Delegate ^ genericHandler, System::Object ^ genericTarget);
override this.InvokeEventHandler : Delegate * obj -> unit

param.name: genericHandler
param.span: 以特定于类型的方式调用的一般处理程序。

span.span: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.

param.name: genericTarget
param.span: 要对其调用处理程序的目标。

span.span: The target to call the handler on.

summary.span: 以特定于类型的方式调用事件处理程序，这样做可以提高事件系统效率。

span.span: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现将强制转换为泛型处理程序，然后调用它。This implementation casts the generic handler as a and then invokes it. 有关此实现模式以及它的原因的详细信息，请参阅并[路由事件概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

summary.span: 获取由属性更改事件报告的属性的新值。

span.span: Gets the new value of a property as reported by a property changed event.

value.span: 在 的实际实现中，此属性的泛型类型将替换为该实现的约束类型。

span.span: In a practical implementation of the , the generic type of this property is replaced with the constrained type of the implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值和类型约束将由构造函数建立。The value and type constraint of this property will be established by the constructor.

span.span: In a practical implementation of the , the generic type of this property is replaced with the constrained type of the implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值和类型约束将由构造函数的类型参数。The value and type constraint of this property will be established by the constructor's type arguments.
